query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_addresses,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isWhale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as whale_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isSuspicious = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as suspicious_count,
  MAX(lastActiveAt) as latest_activity
FROM addresses;
